participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is enthusiastic about music and enjoys deep conversations about his favorite bands.
participant_1.background: My favorite food is steak. My grandpa was in wwii. I own a chevy tahoe. My favorite genre of music is rock. I do not know how to swim.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Emily is cheerful and friendly, often sharing her thoughts about relationships and music with others.
participant_2.background: I ve been in a relationship for 2 years. My dad is a dentist and my mom is a teacher. I work at a daycare. I am a college student. My major is in business administration.

content.text: What's your favorite kind of music?
I love rock music.
Me too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I like The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands! I also like The Doors and Pink Floyd.
I love The Doors! I've been listening to them a lot lately.
Me too! Their music is so good.
What's your favorite song by The Doors?
I can't choose just one! They have so many good songs. But I really like "Light My Fire."
That's a great song! I also like "Break On Through."
Those are both great songs!
What's your favorite band that's not rock music?
I like a lot of different kinds of music. But I really like country music.
Me too! I love country music.
What's your favorite country song?
I can't choose just one! There are so many good country songs. But I really like "Friends in Low Places" by Garth Brooks.
That's a great song! I also like "The Dance" by Garth Brooks.
Those are both great songs!
What's your favorite band that's not country music?
I also like rap music.
Me too! I love rap music.
What's your favorite rap song?
I can't choose just one! There are so many good rap songs. But I really like "Hypnotize" by The Notorious B.I.G.
That's a great song! I also like "Juicy" by The Notorious B.I.G.
Those are both great songs!
